comments.body: Add `props.put(IntegrationTestUtils.INTERNAL_LEAVE_GROUP_ON_CLOSE, true);` to speed up the closing phase of the test.
Can we test the whole topology description for both optimize / no-optimize case, to make sure we do not have any naming regressions?
I'm not sure I follow completely.  Do you mean the sections in common? As we can't test the entire topology description as it has changed from the optimization.
